name: PPBALL (alessaZ)
description:
What do you want to do when you are alone in the space? Wow, it is a good time to play pinball game!  You have three chances to play this game to get the highest score.

This is a cool pinball game! We have great designs and sound effects. You can feel like you are in the game when playing it. This is a game for everyone! You will love it.

It is easy to play. You can use A, D to control flippers, and space to control the pressure of plunger.
